name: Cosmic Rocket Defender
description: In Cosmic Rocket Defender, use your rocket launcher to dodge bombardments from swarms of attackers, while blasting them out of the sky as they swoop down, strafe and attempt to dive bomb you out of existence.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8 Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI or NVidia card w/ 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 60 MB available space

reviews.review_text: It looks like an updated version of Space Invaders, and that's what it is. If you want something that will waste a few minutes, activates that sense of nostalgia, and looks cool, look no further.

This game feels like a mediocre clone of Titan Attacks by Puppygames. There isn't any reason to play this one. I didn't find any crashes or problems just felt that everything was mediocre: sound, graphics, level design, missing sense of progression.
